name: Monster Slayer (nithinmuthukumar, jenny.shen, VikS)
description:
Monster Slayer (nithinmuthukumar, jenny.shen, VikS) is a RPG game developed by nithinmuthukumar, jenny.shen and VikS. It was originally released in 2019.
You can play Monster Slayer (nithinmuthukumar, jenny.shen, VikS) on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
